title: Initialize Claude Code configuration
description: Create CLAUDE.md with project-specific instructions. This file helps Claude understand your codebase architecture, coding conventions, and key patterns.

title: Review and enable marketplace plugins
description:
The following plugin marketplaces have been configured for this project:

- beads-marketplace
- allbeads-marketplace
- claude-plugins-official-marketplace
- claude-code-marketplace
- skills-marketplace
- chrome-devtools-mcp-marketplace
- claude-skill-marketplace
- repomix-marketplace
- prose-marketplace

Consider which plugins would be useful for your workflow and enable them:

```bash
# List available plugins
claude plugin marketplace list

# Enable a plugin
claude plugin enable <plugin>@<marketplace>
```

Note: beads and allbeads plugins are enabled by default.

title: Agent Onboarding
description: Configure AI agents for this repository. Complete these tasks to set up agent configurations for Claude, Cursor, Kiro, Aider, and GitHub Copilot.
